definition: to patronize/to support/to praise/(Internet slang) to like (an online post on Facebook etc)

sentences.english: GLO started the sponsorship of the Confederation of African Football African Player of the Year Award.
sentences.chinese: 格洛開始贊助的非洲足球聯合會非洲年度最佳球員。

sentences.english: He handled the gaggle of media, sponsors and fans with extraordinary aplomb .
sentences.chinese: 他處理的媒體，贊助商和球迷們以非凡的沉着鵝羣。

sentences.english: I financed his initial research and helped him out when times were tough.
sentences.chinese: 我贊助他早初的研究並在困難時刻幫助他。

sentences.english: Joe Chavara: I applaud Budweiser as a sponsor for doing this.
sentences.chinese: 我感謝百威贊助這個活動。

sentences.english: But now sponsors and advertisers are growing wary of association with a sport riven with drug abuse.
sentences.chinese: 現在贊助商和廣告主終於對環法的藥物濫用發難了。
年冊贊助廣告費，可自由選擇。

sentences.english: More running sponsorships are in the works, according to Adidas.
sentences.chinese: 據阿迪達斯透露還將爲更多跑步賽事提供贊助。

sentences.english: Eventually, Mr. Crowley said, he would like to work with businesses on sponsored badges.
sentences.chinese: 克羅雷說最終他們將與企業在“贊助獎章”上合作。

sentences.english: The Fairbank Center for Chinese Studies at Harvard sponsored the conference.
sentences.chinese: 哈佛大學費正清中國研究中心贊助了此次會議。

sentences.english: Since then it has held conferences biennially with sponsorship from host countries and other parties.
sentences.chinese: 自此，主辦國和其他人士每兩年便贊助舉行該會議。

sentences.english: Frequently, they sponsor the main exhibitions and journals for an industry.
sentences.chinese: 它們經常贊助行業的主要展覽與期刊。

sentences.english: But no ice-cream company wanted to support the show so it became a milk tea shop.
sentences.chinese: 但是由於沒有廠商願意贊助，冰淇淋店變成了奶茶店。

sentences.english: The " Yao factor" is already driving up prices for sponsorships and naming rights.
sentences.chinese: “姚明現象”已經令贊助費和冠名權身價大增。

sentences.english: According to the Thai Theravada tradition, the Kathina robes and other requisite offerings are sponsored by various individuals.
sentences.chinese: 根據泰國佛教傳統僧袍與一切供品均由各方佛友贊助。

sentences.english: This exciting football match is sponsored by Marlboro.
sentences.chinese: 這場精彩的足球賽是由萬寶露贊助的。

sentences.english: Sponsors are identified on the Keiretsu Forum web site.
sentences.chinese: 贊助商在Keiretsu論壇會的網站上被認可。

definition: to organize/to host (a conference or sports event)
to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to compete/to take part in a competition
